page.title: 02INTRODUCTION (2)
page.content: Music plays an important part in the cultural life of the Brighouse area. The Brighouse and Rastrick Brass Band is internationally famous. There are also a number of very successful marching bands in the district, who compete at national level. The Brighouse Amateur Light Opera Society makes regular musical offerings to appreciative audiences, as do many other local choral groups. Amateur dramatics is another facet of the town's leisuretime activities. There are a number of flourishing local societies, not the least of which is the Brighouse Children's Theatre where young talent is fostered to good advantage. The Art Society holds regular meetings and exhibitions. Examples of some of the work of its members were recently hung in the House of Commons.
